rules_text:
Draw four cards, then discard a card.
Create an implant token with a Vigilance counter and a flying counter. [i](It’s a token artifact with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put its counters on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery”)[/i]
